com.pizza.Model

Class Kunde

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizza.CMModel.DBConnect
      • com.pizza.Model.Kunde

  • public class Kunde
extends DBConnect

    Models the Kunde entry of the Kunde Table

    The Kunde class is used to model the entries of the kunde table of the database. In addition to getters and setter of the corresponding fields, there is a method used to store a new entry to the table.
